page.title: 20A day at school in St.Albans
page.content: A{school day}in the life of{Perdita {Robbins}age 8 years.May 1985. {Got up}this morning at{7.00}Dressed and did my hair.Fed Fern and Bumble our rabbits.Porridge and a cup of tea for breakfast.Brushed teeth and packed bag.{8.20 went to school.}Played for a while before going into school.After {assembly}we had{English.}After play we had{maths.}During the{lunch hour}we have{country dancing}followed by {lunch.}We had{P.E.}followed by{R.E.} After play we watched{"Picture Box" {The bell}went for home time at{15.30 Got home,had a drink and something to eat then {watched television}for 2 hours.After dinner I played with my { {Sindy dolls}until{21.30}when I watched T.V.again.At{20.30}I had a drink of milk and went off to bed.
